Name: Hyper Bullet
About the game: Hyper Bullet is a top-down action game replenished with agreeable vaporwave aesthetics, pure joy of combat and gunplay rhythm. Contents: 7 unique scenes 15 different weapons Extra protection with body armour A number of enemy types 10 selected BGMs Play your favorite music file (mp3, ogg) in game Infinite gameplay Pick up a weapon, defeat oncoming enemies, survive in infinite crises, and write down your own legend here...
Meta Title: Hyper Bullet: Oct 6, 2021, Tony Wang and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Hyper Bullet? Check out the release date (Oct 6, 2021), developer insights from Tony Wang, and a complete game summary.
